track.name: Halftime
comments:
Stay tuned, I assume, the real rap comes at halftime. 

Straight FIRE!

When i attach there aint a Army that can strike back...

Classic Nas = Classic Music
Ill
wow, listen to this! amazing flow.
The beat is too sick, it could come out today and still sound fresh.
I love how Nas almost implies that bisexuals are stupid.
da illest illmatic
those sleigh bells are gangster
Dat bass [3]
Dat bass [2]
in the darkness im heartless like when the NARCs hit word to Marcus Garvey I hardly sparked it
Easily one of hip-hop's all time classic songs.
back in 83 i was an mc sparkin
as ill as a convict who kills for phone time. DAMN!
Nasty Nas at his best
"with more kicks than a baby in a mother's stomach"
BEST SONG FOR ILLMATIC
that's like malcolm x, catching the jungle fever
This was the 1337th song i've hit "love" on.  Pretty true.
DANCIN' 4AM DRUNK TO THIS
